abstract: Andy Webster reviews movie Memories of the Sword, directed by Park Heung-sik.
lead_paragraph: Park Heung-sik’s martial-arts spectacle is set during the Goreyo era in Korea’s history.

headline.main: Review: Korean Warriors Seek Vengeance in ‘Memories of the Sword’
headline.print_headline: Review: Korean Warriors Seek Vengeance in ‘Memories of the Sword’

snippet: Park Heung-sik’s martial-arts spectacle is set during the Goreyo era in Korea’s history.
